page.title: 12MY MUM'S DAY
page.content:
MY MUM GETS UP AT 7:15AM. SHE TAKES MATTHEW TO SCHOOL AT 8:20AM.SHE GOES TO WORK AT 9:00AM. SHE WORKS AT HARTSPRING SPORTS CENTRE LOOKING AFTER CHILDREN WHILE MUMS PLAY TENNIS,BADMINTON ETC.SHE WORKS FROM 10AM UNTIL 12PM,ON CERTAIN DAYS OF THE WEEK.ON THE OTHER DAYS SHE STAYS AT HOME DOING THE HOUSEWORK.WHEN SHE HAS FINISHED THE HOUSEWORK SHE KNITS OR READS UNTIL 3PM WHEN SHE COLLECTS MATTHEW FROM SCHOOL.WHEN I GET HOME I USUALLY WATCH TV WHILE MUM GETS THE DINNER.WE HAVE DINNER AT 6PM EXCEPT WHEN MATTHEW OR I HAVE TO GO TO A CLUB.IN THE EVENING WE USUALLY WATCH TV OR HAVE A GAME TOGETHER.WE GO TO BED AT 8PM OR 9PM OR IN BETWEEN MUCH TO MUM's RELIEF.
.
